Articles.Content:
The Republic of Kerbania would like to announce the beginning of an auspicious age of exploration with the launch of the Kubble Space Telescope now in orbit around our home planet, our new orbital habitat Kir will be set to launch soon!

Glory to the Republic of Kerbania and our brave Kerbonauts!

(Honestly, this game is awesome! next stop the Mun )

Welcome to the Forums, comrade!

-Radion Spaceworks
